instructions:
Sauté the Kielbasa pieces in 1/2 tbsp drippings in a 4 quart sauce pot at medium/low heat for about 4
minutes. Add remaining ingredients and bring to a boil. Reduce heat and simmer uncovered for 20 minutes.
Serves 5.
ingredients: 1 pkg Uncle Ben's Black Bean and Rice Soup mix
1 can (15 oz) stewed tomatoes, cut up
1/2 lb Kielbasa, quartered and sliced 1/4 inch
name: Black Bean And Rice Soup
creator: John Decker
